issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Implement support for casting string to date in sql expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10759](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10759). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If DataFusion had support for creating date literals using a cast expression such as 
 CAST('2019-01-01' AS DATE) this would allow a user-friendly way for direct (and therefore more efficient) comparison of date columns to scalar values (compared to representing dates as strings and then resorting to string comparison).
 I already have a basic implementation that works, just have to add some more tests.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10759?focusedCommentId=17242513) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8794
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8794>
